levelList.name: Wingbeat
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by 10% of damage dealt<style="highlight"></style>

(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
<style="highlight">[EndSkill] If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, gain (excess heal/max HP) x 10 [AttackUp] next turn. (max 3 per turn)</style>

levelList.name: Tidal Elegy
levelList.desc:
When attacking just a single target(in Focused Encounters, a Core and its connected Parts count as a single target), Coin Power +2 and deal +100% damage
[WhenUse] If the main target has 4+ [Sinking], Clash Power +1
[BeforeAttack] If the main target has higher than 1 Gloom Resist., deal +2% damage for every 0.1 excess Resist. (max 10%)
[BeforeAttack] At 2+ Gloom Reson., deal +5% damage for every Gloom Reson. (max 20%)
[EndSkill] If 1 or more targets are killed, deal ([Sinking] Potency on each target / 2) Gloom damage against 2 random enemies (max 15; prioritizes targeted enemies with the most [Sinking] Potency)<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If there are Staggered, Part broken, or killed units among the targets, inflict 2 [Sinking] against a random non-targeted enemy (once per turn; in Focused Encounters, each Part count as 1 target)<style="highlight"></style>
- If there is just a single target, apply it to 3 targets instead<style="highlight"></style>
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Tidal Elegy
levelList.desc:

[BeforeAttack] At 2+ Gloom Reson., deal +<style="highlight">8</style>% damage for every Gloom Reson. (max <style="highlight">32</style>%)
[EndSkill] If 1 or more targets are killed, deal ([Sinking] Potency on each target / 2) Gloom damage against 2 random enemies (max 15; prioritizes targeted enemies with the most [Sinking] Potency)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If there are Staggered, Part broken, or killed units among the targets, inflict 2 [Sinking] against a random non-targeted enemy (once per turn; for Focused Encounters, each Part count as 1 target)<style="highlight"></style>
- When attacking just a single target, apply it to 3 targets instead<style="highlight"></style>
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight"></style>
